title: Avoiding a Toxic Family Housing Situation (Hour 2)
description:
Dave Ramsey & George Kamel discuss:

Investing vs. saving up for a house,

Avoiding a toxic family housing situation,

When to increase disability coverage,

The immorality of student loan forgiveness,

How to save for kids college.


Support Our Sponsor:
Christian Healthcare Ministries

Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
